Summary: Very creepy, dont know if contained alien life forms or not.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Live Oak
There were no other sightings in Live Oak on or around March 22nd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking around in my woods behind my house when randomly, this thing just comes by and hovers for about 15 mins or so.While it was hovering in mid air, it had white and gold lights flashing, it was like it was looking for something.After a few mins of looking,ot just zoomed off.
